text: Elx (in Catalan) or Elche (in Spanish) is the third biggest city in Valencia, and the second in the Alicante province, in eastern Spain. The city has 215,000 inhabitants and is famous for its palm trees and the Mystery of Elx, a theatrical piece. Category:Cities in the Valencian Community Category:Municipalities in the Valencian Community Category:Province of Alicante
title: Elx
